search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Zenler (zenler.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Zenler can be found at: [https://www.newzenler.com/pricing](https://www.newzenler.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Find answers to the most popular customer questions about Zenler products and services.

##### What is Zenler?

Zenler is an all-in-one online course platform designed to help creators and educators build, market, and sell their online courses. It provides tools for course creation, website building, email marketing, community engagement, and more.

##### How does Zenler compare to other online course platforms?

Zenler stands out with its comprehensive suite of tools, allowing you to manage everything from course creation to marketing in one place. Unlike many other platforms, Zenler includes built-in email marketing, automation, and a powerful community feature, making it easier to scale your business without relying on multiple third-party tools.

##### Is coding or technical knowledge required to use Zenler?

No, Zenler is designed with ease of use in mind. Its drag-and-drop interface and pre-built templates allow you to create professional-looking websites and courses without any coding or technical expertise.

##### Can I host live classes and webinars on Zenler?

Yes, Zenler offers integrated live webinar and live class features. You can host live sessions directly through the platform, interact with your students in real-time, and even automate webinars for future use.

##### What pricing plans are available for Zenler?

Zenler offers various pricing plans to fit different needs, including a free plan with limited features and paid plans with more advanced tools. Each plan includes unlimited students, courses, and communities, with the primary differences being in marketing features, automation, and support.

##### Is there a free plan available for Zenler?

Yes, Zenler offers a free plan that allows you to explore the platform's features and see how it can benefit your online course business. The trial includes access to key features, so you can start building your courses and websites right away.

Loved by thousands of Course Creators
-------------------------------------

With Zenler you get an entire ecosystem of support, expertise and best practices to help you grow.

![Image 4: Tara Hewson](https://d235vmrai5heq2.cloudfront.net/web/assets/images/testimonials/tara-hewson.webp)

###### Tara Hewson

Social Media Strategist

> Zenler has been a game changer for my business! I love how easy and beautiful the interface is for my students and that it includes every type of software I need in one platform that not only works out so much cheaper than using multiple platforms but makes everything so simple to implement and seamless to navigate.

![Image 5: James Milo](https://d235vmrai5heq2.cloudfront.net/web/assets/images/testimonials/scott-carr.webp)

###### Scott Carr

Teacher

> Zenler has been wonderful to work with! Their video trainings are in bite-size pieces for easy digestion. Their FB group is second to none with such an active group that are there to support and help with pretty much any question you might have in regards to the platform and using it to its maximum.

![Image 6: Michael Lavers](https://d235vmrai5heq2.cloudfront.net/web/assets/images/testimonials/michael-lavers.webp)

###### Michael Lavers

Level Up English

> I've been using Zenler for a couple years and it's been fantastic! Now most of my income is generated through their platform with a membership site, and overall it's really easy to set up and manage. The support team are quite responsive too and it's obvious they have a vision for the future.

![Image 7: Namita Purohit](https://d235vmrai5heq2.cloudfront.net/web/assets/images/testimonials/namita-purohit.webp)

###### Namita Purohit

Life Coach

> Zenler is a great course platform. I love it because of the great leadership and support team that backs it. Also, I like how it is an all-in-one platform with courses, community, webinars, and more. I don't have to hook up with different platforms to get things done, and it is also cost-effective when compared to getting subscriptions for all these platforms separately.

Insane discounts exclusively for founding Members. Grab it at a never to be repeated price before the launch for a limited time.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Zenler offers promotional discounts for founding members before launch.
